definitions.text: move away from a place into another direction
examples: Go away before I start to cry

definitions.text: be at variance with; be out of line with

examples: The family took off for Florida

definitions.text: remove oneself from an association with or participation in
examples: She left her position with the Red Cross
He left the Senate after two terms
after 20 years with the same company, she pulled up stakes

definitions.text: wander from a direct or straight course
